attributes.action: Abolish the position: Speaker of the house - replace with a credible alternative
attributes.additional_details: The current speaker of the house has shown in recent months that the position of speaker is not above political opinions or bias. A new fairer alternative to appointing an already active political figure to the role has to be considered
attributes.background: British politics are being made a mockery of and shaped by an individual who is neither elected or held accountable for their actions.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what role you'd like to replace the position of Speaker with or how it would differ from the current role. The Speaker is an elected Member of Parliament and is elected to the role of Speaker by other MPs. You can find out more here:

https://www.parliament.uk/business/commons/the-speaker/the-role-of-the-speaker/role-of-the-speaker/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
